movies.title: I Want to Get Even
movies.plot: Cobra, the pornographer, abductor, drugs and weapons dealer, and his henchmen abduct and gang rape Irma, a woman who likes rough sex with her strong husband, Rudy. Irma's husband gets her free but in the escape she suffers an accident, and aborts. Irma's husband rapes Cobra's sister in revenge. The gang attacks Rudy, torture him, then drag him tied to a motorcycle until he is bleeding bad, then the Drug Lord beats him some more. Irma the mistreated housewife turns suddenly into the sexy wildcat commando, in tight shorts and boots, sleeveless low cut top, and head bandanna, who happens to have a handy bazooka to terminate the gang with great prejudice. Then she embraces Rudy, who was strong enough to survive the gang. Will he survive the Lady Exterminator?
movies.simplePlot: Cobra, the pornographer, abductor, drugs and weapons dealer, and his henchmen abduct and gang rape Irma, a woman who likes rough sex with her strong husband, Rudy. Irma's husband gets her ...

biography.bio: Eva Arnaz was born on July 14, 1958 in Bukittinggi, Indonesia as Evayanti. She is an actress, known for Ferocious Female Freedom Fighters (1982), I Want to Get Even (1987) and The Warrior (1981).
biography.name: Eva Arnaz

biography.bio: Clift Sangra is an actor, known for I Want to Get Even (1987), Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983) and Dia sang penakluk (1984). He has been married to Suzzanna since 1983.
biography.name: Clift Sangra

biography.bio: Nena Rosier is an actress, known for I Want to Get Even (1987), Nyi blorong (1982) and Perawan rimba (1988).
biography.name: Nena Rosier

biography.bio: Rengga Takengon is an actor, known for I Want to Get Even (1987), Savage Terror (1980) and Escape from Hellhole (1983).
biography.name: Rengga Takengon

biography.bio: Hendro Tangkilisan is an actor and production designer, known for Angel of Fury (1992), I Want to Get Even (1987) and Rage and Honor II (1993).
biography.name: Hendro Tangkilisan

biography.placeOfBirth: Batavia, Batavia, Dutch East Indies [now Jakarta, Indonesia]
biography.bio: Dicky Zulkarnaen was born on October 12, 1939 in Batavia, Batavia, Dutch East Indies. He was an actor, known for Escape from Hellhole (1983), Salah Asuha (1972) and Maidens Revenge (1987). He was married to Mieke Wijaya. He died on March 10, 1995 in Jakarta, Indonesia.
biography.name: Dicky Zulkarnaen

biography.bio: Godfried Sancho is an actor, known for I Want to Get Even (1987), Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985) and Fatima (1983).
biography.name: Godfried Sancho

biography.placeOfBirth: Teloekbetoeng, Lampongsche Districten, Dutch East Indies [now Bandar Lampung, Lampung, Indonesia]
biography.bio: H.I.M. Damsyik was born on March 14, 1929 in Teloekbetoeng, Lampongsche Districten, Dutch East Indies as Haji Incik Muhammad Damsyik. He was an actor, known for Kembalinya si janda kembang (1992), Samson and Delilah (1987) and Satan's Slave (1982). He died on February 2, 2012 in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
biography.name: H.I.M. Damsyik

biography.bio: Alfian is an actor, known for Guntur tengah malam (1990), Escape from Hellhole (1983) and I Want to Get Even (1987).
biography.name: Alfian

biography.bio: Yona S. Kamarullah is an actress, known for I Want to Get Even (1987).
biography.name: Yona S. Kamarullah

biography.bio: Tuty Kusnendar is an actress, known for I Want to Get Even (1987) and Soerabaja '45 (1990).
biography.name: Tuty Kusnendar

biography.bio: Husen Nur is an actor, known for I Want to Get Even (1987).
biography.name: Husen Nur
